root: ^As you step into the enchanting clearing with the sparkling pond, right at the heart of the forest, the air becomes thick with the sweet scent of the blooming flowers.
^The soft sunlight filters through the green canopy, creating a mesmerizing and beautiful play of shadows and light on the forest floor and glittery pond.
^Pastel cushions are scattered under the trees, creating a serene atmosphere for the flowerkin to relax and take time for themselves around the pond.
^As you gaze around for a vacant spot, a confident and alluring figure catches your eye.
^A flowerkin with the petals of the color of the sunset, reminiscent of a peony, sits gracefully on the pastel cushions nearest to the pond.
^As you approach she looks up and a playful smile dances on her lips.
^"Hello there, I don’t think I’ve seen you here before."
^Her voice is as melodious as the summer breeze, emphasizing her alluring charisma.

s: ^"I couldn’t resist exploring this magical place, it’s truly enchanting. Do you come here often?"
^"I was looking for someone to help me. You seem familiar with this place, am I right?"

g-0: ^The calm yet dashing aura of the pastel pink flowerkin surrounds you, making it hard to finish your sentence without getting caught up in her attractiveness.
^"Guilty as charged. I do have a weakness for beautiful scenery but also for intriguing company. I’m Pion by the way, pleasure to make your acquaintance."

^She chuckles softly, her eyes gleaming with playful mischief when she suggests you to come sit beside her on the pastel cushions. The water sparkles beautifully with the reflections of the surrounding flowers, creating a magical atmosphere.
^"This pond is really magical, is this your favorite place here?"
^_I feel lucky to have stumbled upon such a breathtaking view. You’re lucky to live here.

c-2: ^"Oh, darling, this is my secret heaven. A place to escape the hustle and bustle of the forest. You’re welcome to share it with me, if you need it."
c-3: ^"I’ve always had a knack for finding hidden gems and I’d be delighted to share them with someone as charming as you."
^<i>You are about to enter a mini-game. If you do well, you can score some extra points with this character! Control your bee with WASD.

g-1: ^After a short but alluring conversation with the confident and flirty flowerkin, who makes the magical forest even more enchanting, you decide to move on with your journey.
